column5: The US Coast Guard announced it is adjusting boat occupancy regulations to reflect the fact that the average American has grown bigger and heavier than when the rules were first established nearly 50 years ago. The new standards, which will affect passenger capacity ratings for all boats, take effect December 1.  Expect the Canadian Coast Guard to follow suit.  Click for more info.
I hear the boat manufacturers are also now implimenting larger big gulp sized drink holders and french fry dispensers on the 2012 models.
